events.name: PHPers Summit 2025
events.description:
The largest PHP conference in Poland is approaching fast!

We are honored to invite you to the 9th edition of the PHPers Summit, which will be our biggest event so far. We expect 1000+ participants and 5 tracks, making it one of the largest PHP conferences in the region!

Atmosphere is an aspect of every human meeting that is very close to us. Our events are for every soul, no matter how different and unique they are. If PHPers Summit were a person, it would be someone very calm, smiling, and open. Accept it, feel good and safe.

Before we launch the ticket sales, we reveal to you the prices in each pool.

The conference on May 24, 2025 is being held on the grounds of the Poznan International Fair. Hall 15 (Poznań Congress Center). Enter from the gate 10 (south entrance)
